info.title: Xero OAuth 2.0
info.description: Xero is an accounting solution for small and medium sized businesses.  This connector enables you to access Xero data from the Power Platform.

contact.name: Phil Stubbington / Henley Ridge Management Consulting Limited

scopes.email: Grant read-only access to your email
scopes.openid: Grant read-only access to your open id
scopes.accounting.contacts: Grant read-write access to contacts and contact groups
scopes.accounting.contacts.read: Grant read-only access to contacts and contact groups
scopes.accounting.reports.read: Grant read-only access to accounting reports
scopes.accounting.settings: Grant read-write access to organisation and account settings
scopes.accounting.settings.read: Grant read-only access to organisation and account settings
scopes.accounting.transactions: Grant read-write access to bank transactions, credit notes, invoices, repeating invoices
scopes.paymentservices: Grant read-write access to payment services

get.description: Retrieves all contacts in a Xero organisation

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description: Filter by a comma separated list of ContactIDs. Allows you to retrieve a specific set of contacts in a single call.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: e.g. page=1 - Up to 100 contacts will be returned in a single API call.

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: e.g. includeArchived=true - Contacts with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

parameters.name: summaryOnly
parameters.description: Use summaryOnly=true in GET Contacts and Invoices endpoint to retrieve a smaller version of the response object. This returns only lightweight fields, excluding computation-heavy fields from the response, making the API calls quick and efficient.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search parameter that performs a case-insensitive text search across the Name, FirstName, LastName, ContactNumber and EmailAddress fields.

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with 0 to N Contact

put.description: Creates multiple contacts (bulk) in a Xero organisation

parameters.name: summarizeErrors
parameters.description: If false return 200 OK and mix of successfully created objects and any with validation errors

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Contacts with an array of Contact objects to create in body of request

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with newly created Contact

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

ValidationErrors.Message: The contact name Buzz Lightyear is already assigned to another contact. The contact name must be unique across all active contacts.

post.description: Updates or creates one or more contacts in a Xero organisation

parameters.name: summarizeErrors
parameters.description: If false return 200 OK and mix of successfully created objects and any with validation errors

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with newly created Contact

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

ValidationErrors.Message: The contact name Buzz Lightyear is already assigned to another contact. The contact name must be unique across all active contacts.

get.description: Retrieves sales invoices or purchase bills

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoicesIDs.

parameters.name: InvoiceNumbers
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoiceNumbers.

parameters.name: ContactIDs
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of ContactIDs.

parameters.name: Statuses
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list Statuses. For faster response times we recommend using these explicit parameters instead of passing OR conditions into the Where filter.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: e.g. page=1 â€“ Up to 100 invoices will be returned in a single API call with line items shown for each invoice

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: e.g. includeArchived=true - Invoices with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

parameters.name: createdByMyApp
parameters.description: When set to true you'll only retrieve Invoices created by your app

parameters.name: unitdp
parameters.description: e.g. unitdp=4 â€“ (Unit Decimal Places) You can opt in to use four decimal places for unit amounts

parameters.name: summaryOnly

LineAmountTypes.title: LineAmountTypes
LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you donâ€™t specify this element. See Line Amount Types

Description.description: Description needs to be at least 1 char long. A line item with just a description (i.e no unit amount or quantity) can be created by specifying just a <Description> element that contains at least 1 character

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount (see below) based on the tax rate. This value can be overriden if the calculated <TaxAmount> is not correct.

LineAmount.description: If you wish to omit either of the <Quantity> or <UnitAmount> you can provide a LineAmount and Xero will calculate the missing amount for you. The line amount reflects the discounted price if a DiscountRate has been used . i.e LineAmount = Quantity * Unit Amount * ((100 â€“ DiscountRate)/100)
